question: 貸す
userExplanation:
subject lends to another. 
The other way around is 借りる.
sourceMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an <ja>う</ja> sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>lend</kanji> so the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to lend</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: Allow me <vocabulary>to lend</vocabulary> you some advice. The reading you learned from the kanji can be used here.
